LanguageData.colTradeIconDef.label: 图标
LanguageData.colTradeIconDef.description: A small image of what you are trading.
LanguageData.colTradeInfoDef.description: Button to open the info window.
LanguageData.colTradeCaptionDef.label: caption
LanguageData.colTradeExtraIconsDef.label: 额外图标
LanguageData.colTradeExtraIconsDef.description: Additional icons shown in different situations.
LanguageData.colTradeQuantityDef.label: 可用
LanguageData.colTradeQuantityDef.description: Quantity available for buying or selling.
LanguageData.colTradePriceDef.label: 价格
LanguageData.colTradeCounterDef.label: 计数盒
LanguageData.colTradeCounterDef.description: Numeric box where the current quantity bought or sold is shown and can be entered manually.
LanguageData.colTradeButtonsDef.label: 按钮
LanguageData.colTradeButtonsDef.description: Buttons used to increment or decrement the amount bought or sold.\nClicking the double arrow buttons will increase to most affordable by either party on first click and then to max quantity if clicked again. Hold shift to skip.
